example.text: It's outrageous that Mayor Adams is now planning to export NYC's dangerous sanctuary city policies to the rest of New York. Democrat leaders are responsible for this national security & humanitarian crisis. We must secure our borders, enforce the law, & restore accountability.

I look forward to working with my colleagues to continue to promote constructive discourse and positive leadership for our Nation. Our country faces many challenges today, and it is critically important that Congress works together to find solutions that help seniors, working families and small businesses and family farms.

The House & Senate have now both passed HJRes 39, a bipartisan resolution to rollback President Biden’s solar giveaway to China. The president must immediately sign this legislation to stand up for American jobs and stop China’s unfair trade practices.

Letitia James is the most partisan Attorney General in the nation, and she has lost the public's trust. Unfortunately for the people of New York, she is not above Albany Democrats' rampant culture of corruption, and instead she is proving to be just another part of it.

[[user]] is committed to a future built on freedom. I support bills to: ?Ensure parents have a say in their children’s education ?Defend the Right to life ?End the COVID emergency and lift the harmful vaccine mandates
